trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_SEQ_00<tab>The Archive insists you affix the soul shard to your person.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_KETENRAMM_000_001<tab>The Archive tells me that crystal is filled with knowledge of ancient combat techniques. Might come in handy on yer excursions.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_OFANGEIM_000_005<tab>I'm still surveyin' these fortifications an' checkin' the wilds for potential dangers. Nobody's leavin' until I'm finished, ye hear?

TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_ARCHIVE_000_010<tab>Considering the fact you were summoned to the isle especially, I wouldn't be surprised if the soul shard yields its secrets to you. I suggest you try interacting with it.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You are currently a Phantom Freelancer. Select your chosen phantom job from the window to proceed with the expedition.

TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_ARCHIVE_000_012<tab>Excellent, it would seem you've managed to interface with the soul shard. There is one caveat: I believe it will only work within the confines of the island's ward. Nonetheless, as you accumulate more knowledge, you'll soon be able to draw on more potent techniques.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_ARCHIVE_000_013<tab>What's more, I don't think that's the only soul shard on the island. I'm positive you'll acquire others on your travels.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_ARCHIVE_000_014<tab>The more you possess, the greater the array of ancient techniques you will have at your fingertips.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_ARCHIVE_000_015<tab>Well, I shan't keep you from your excursions any longer, though you'd better speak to that imposing lass over there before you depart.

TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_KETENRAMM_000_050<tab>Ofangeim's been inspectin' the structural integrity of these fortifications. Hopefully, she hasn't found anythin' untoward, or we'll be stuck shorin' up these defenses for a spell...
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_ARCHIVE_000_055<tab>There's precious little else I can tell you about the soul shards. I suggest you go and speak with Ofangeim.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_OFANGEIM_000_099<tab>I reckon ye'd better try tinkerin' with that there crystal before ye leave.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_OFANGEIM_000_100<tab>These walls have seen better days, but they're solid enough. As long as we secure the entrances, the camp'll be safe while yer out roamin' the isle.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_KETENRAMM_000_101<tab>Roamin's all well and good, but we'll need a firm plan of action if we're to make any headway.
TEXT_KINGKD005_05313_KETENRAMM_000_102<tab>Before ye leave, let's consider our approach.
